mapper.select: /* snippComment.getAllCommentList */ SELECT SC.UID AS COMMENT_UID ,SC.BOARD_UID ,SC.CONTENT ,SC.REG_UID ,SC.REG_DT ,SU_REG.USER_ID AS REG_ID ,SC.UPDT_UID ,SC.UPDT_DT ,SU_UPDT.USER_ID AS UPDT_ID FROM SNP_COMMENT SC LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_REG ON SU_REG.UID = SC.REG_UID LEFT JOIN SNP_USER SU_UPDT ON SU_UPDT.UID = SC.UPDT_UID WHERE SC.BOARD_UID = #{boardUid} AND SC.DELETE_AT = 'N'
